alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 2:49PM EDT until June 04 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/. * At 249 PM EDT/149 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, or 15 miles north of Apalachicola, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Buck Siding, Highland View, Beverly, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, White City, Milltown, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Simmons Bayou, Beacon Hill, Saint Joe Beach, Fort Gadsden and Hays Place. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
